channel.title: Hezbollah on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Hezbollah on Rob Barry

item.title: U.S. Indicts Alleged Terror Financier With Ties to American Food Producer
item.description: Federal authorities indicted Kassim Tajideen, an alleged terror financier whose family businesses engaged in commodity deals for years with an iconic American food producer. Read the full story here.

item.title: The Travels of Mrs. Murray's Toyota Unveil Terror-Finance Network
item.description: Annie Murray’s 2009 Land Cruiser followed the same overseas car caravan that U.S. officials alleged raised millions of dollars for Hezbollah–a trade route they thought they had cleaned up five years ago. Read the full story here.

item.title: Terror Finance Abroad Touches Thanksgiving at Home
item.description: U.S. companies are barred from doing business with people and entities named on the government’s designated-terrorist list. The firm that touts the Butterball turkey is being investigated over such alleged ties. Read the full story here.
